page.title: 14A Typical Weekend
page.content: On{Saturday}I get up at about 9.15 am and have toast and syrup for {breakfast.}I watch Cartoon Time, Scooby Doo and Number 73. I wear my {older clothes}and{play}'dressing up' with Lizzie Hunt. For{dinner}we have stew and dumplings, then we play again. At {tea}we have sandwiches, crips, and cake. In the evening we{watch T.V.}and go to{bed at 9.30 pm. On{Sunday}morning I have cereal for breakfast and then I go to{Sunday {School}at Much Wenlock at 10.30 am. Later back home we have{dinner possibly beef, carrots, peas and potatoes. In the{afternoon}we go to Madeley to {see grandparents.}Mum and Dad talk while we{play ball}outside. We {watch T.V.}and go to bed on returning.
